name: CNContactRelation
desc: An immutable object that represents the relationship between one contact to another.

items.name: init(name: String)
items.desc: Creates an object with the name of the related contact.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name of the related contact.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationSpouse: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's spouse.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationPartner: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's partner.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationDaughter: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's daughter.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationSon: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's son.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationChild: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's child.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationFather: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's father.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationMother: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's mother.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationParent: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's parent.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationBrother: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's brother.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationSister: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's sister.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationFriend: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's friend.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationAssistant: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's assistant.

items.name: let CNLabelContactRelationManager: String
items.desc: The label for the contact's manager.
